name: Raymond LANTHIER v. NOTRE DAME CHURCH

parties: Raymond LANTHIER v. NOTRE DAME CHURCH.

opinions.text:
ORDER
This is a defendant’s motion to affirm a judgment entered in its favor in the Superi- or Court after a hearing. The motion was considered by us at oral argument held on Monday, December 1, 1980.
After consideration of the record and arguments, it is hereby ordered that the motion to affirm is granted and the judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed.
MURRAY, J., did not participate.

attorneys: John F. McBurney, Pawtucket, for plaintiff.
Breslin & Sweeney, John G. Earle, Warwick, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
Raymond LANTHIER v. NOTRE DAME CHURCH.
No. 80-188-Appeal.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Dec. 11, 1980.
John F. McBurney, Pawtucket, for plaintiff.
Breslin & Sweeney, John G. Earle, Warwick, for defendant.
